title: What is the difference between product development and technology development? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some organizations blur the line between these activities but it is useful to distinguish them. The purpose of product development is to develop a product that will be offered for sale in the marketplace; a company’s technology roadmap shows when work on future products will begin and when they will be offered for sale. The purpose of technology development is to create or refine a new technical approach to solving a problem; a company’s technology roadmap shows when work on new technologies will begin and when they might be sufficiently mature to use in its products. Product developers are more concerned with producing an economically viable product. They worry about launch dates, sell prices, sales volumes, manufacturing costs and profit margins. Technology developers usually operate in a higher risk domain and focus on reducing risk and improving the performance, utility, and cost of a technology. For example, H-P might have a product development team designing a new printer and a technology development team creating new high-performance toners for use on many different printer products. In short, all the differences between technology and product development arise from different purposes and different success criteria.

I think the answer depends on the context, but let me try a general answer. Product development is the advancement of a product. This may or may not involve technology. The technology may be code, circuit boards, or machines. It may involve more than those creating the physical product and may involve the product managers, marketing folks, etc. Product used to be differentiated from a service, however those lines are completely blurred now. Technology development is an advancement of something using technology. This something could be a product or a service. In practice, they often mean the same thing, the engineering/programming team responsible for creating the product.

Technology development is advancement of technology to address some serious problems that is affecting mankind or enhance the life of mankind (AI, Gene Therapy, Solar Technology etc.). Technology development is mostly related to research and creation of IP. Product development is creation products incorporating technology advancements (for e.g facial recognition for making payments instead of using legacy methods)

Product development The creation of products with new or different characteristics that offer new or additional benefits to the customer. Product development may involve modification of an existing product or its presentation, or formulation of an entirely new product that satisfies a newly defined customer want or market niche Technology development The development of technology may draw upon many fields of knowledge, including scientific, engineering, mathematical, linguistic, and historical knowledge, to achieve some practical result.
